item.title: Forum Help
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Bang Train explained the oveview on how to do it. Fusin forums is not an easy task, especially if you select certain areas to be connected. IPB is just like every other forum in how to do a basic fusion. What you will mainly want to do is create two Databases (prefix databases) and two different forums. Next, however the PHP files access the SQL Databases is the secret behind the fusion. What I did with SMF, is I made the secondary forums access both databases at once. Then, throughout the PHP Source files (including the primary Load.php, but I do not know what loads what in IPB), I made the certain parts I want fused to call upon the second String database instead of the first. It is a very easy concept, just as easy to carry out. The only troubles I had were the fact that each SMF Source files carries out more purposes than one would expect. If you have anymore questions, I will be happy to answer them (you probably will want to PM me.)
